Gérard Worms (1 August 1936 – 31 August 2020) was a French banker and businessman. He was the Vice Chairman of Rothschild Europe and Senior Advisor of Rothschild & Cie Banque. He was born in Paris.
He taught at the HEC Paris, the University of Paris and his alma mater, the École Polytechnique. He was the Chairman of Rothschild & Cie Banque (Paris) from 1995 to 1999. He also was Chief Executive Officer of N M Rothschild & Sons.
Worms died on 31 August 2020, aged 84.
